item.title: ACEP emPOC
item.description: ACEP emPOC - The American College of Emergency Physicians (ACEP) Emergency Medicine Point of Care (emPOC) app is a cross platform application designed to provide evidence-based, Emergency Medicine clinical content in a point-of-care tool designed for use at the bedside. Content within this app is curated from the field’s top experts and thought leaders. A web version of this content is available separately on ACEP’s website. For the Android and iOS Flutter release of emPOC (Dec ‘21), we rebuilt emPOC from scratch in collaboration with ACEP’s staff.
